1113.content:
Joe and his classmates were taking a nap, sleeping peacefully on different colored mats.
As he slept, he snored loudly.

A boy, who couldn't take it anymore, got up on his hands and knees and crawled toward Joe, withdrawing from his pocket, a small bottle containing green liquid, thinking it was a cure for the snores. When he reached Joe, the boy pinched his nose and pulled it back, to open his mouth wide, then he tipped the green liquid into Joe's mouth. The boy, satisfied that the snores has stopped, put the bottle away and crawled back to his mat.

When nap time was over, Joe woke up to the roars and stomping sounds of giant kids running around and chatting loudly.

"What the--!" he yelled in shock, gazing in terror at the scene.

Joe's best friend, Andy was surprised to see a tiny version of his friend on the floor, he rushed forward from behind Joe and scooped him up in his hand, scaring Joe out of his wits. He screamed as he was lifted up from the floor at a great speed, he felt the G-force blow his hair as he was raised to a billboard-size face of his friend, Andy.

Andy opened his hand, and Joe lay panting on Andy's palm.
Andy giggled as he look over his tiny friend.

Joe was....
1113.title: Nap Time

122.title: Nate, 7th

1223.content: Ever since 6th grade you've been scared of going to the bathroom because of those wretched 8th graders; this year was going to be different though, now your in seventh grade and you can use the bathroom whenever you want, well if an 8th grader's not in there. You walk in and you see that the stall is out of order and there are 3 urinals. To the right is a sixth grader named Nick. He was a bit shorter. To the left was a 7th grader named Mason. Mason had blonder hair and blue eyes while Nick had brown hair. You walk up to the middle urinal, right before you let your fly down you close your eyes for a second, when you opened your eyes you were on the floor only 1 inch tall. You have to make a quick decision, run to mason, nick, or do something else.
1223.title: Bathroom

choices: bathroom (after humiliation or you need to go)
131.content:
Hunter had just moved to the area and didn't have a lot of friends yet. Because of his shy nature it was hard for him to approach people, especially when entering high school where everyone already has their group of long term friends. The only person he'd really had a chance to talk to was the kid next door to him, Ronny. He was an energetic guy who loved joking around and doing sports, Hunter suspected that he had some sort of hyper active syndrome or something. His body was very lean and showed growing muscles under his tanned skin. Where as Hunter, despite his naturally Italian olive skin tone, was a bit paler and more scrawny thanks to all the time he spent inside.
At school, Hunter was lucky to be ignored most of the time. his scrawny physique and general loner status made him an easy target for bullying. If he wasn't being ignored by his fellow students at the all boys school, then he was being shoved in a locker or pushed face first into a toilet or some more direct form of humiliation. It didn't help that the coach for most of the sports teams and all the PE classes had insisted on making you his little helper in cleaning up the locker room and collecting all the dirty jocks and uniforms; he thought it would help build character and show you what real men where like.
So, to sum up, the first month of high school SUCKED. And it was about to get sooooo much worse.

where do you shrink?
131.title: Freshman = Fresh Meat
